alert.note: Alert for Henry; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:13AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mercer, southwestern Rock Island, northeastern Henry, southeastern Washington, southwestern Muscatine and Louisa Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 512 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Washington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cotter around 520 AM CDT. Wyman around 525 AM CDT. Columbus Junction and Columbus City around 530 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Letts, Wapello, Fruitland, Grandview, New Boston and Toolesboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
